item.title: All Ocelot Duel Ending Outcomes in Metal Gear Solid Delta Snake Eater
item.description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta Snake Eater remains entirely faithful to the original Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater , including the immense details and alternate cutscenes available. After an epic duel with a living legend, Snake and EVA have one last threat to worry about: Ocelot. Ocelot will force Snake into a duel, where he must decide on which revolver to pick up. The player's choice between the left and right revolver in MGS Delta Snake Eater determines the reward they get, and the mini-cutscene that plays. Below, players can view all four of them to see what they missed out on, along with what ending they should choose.

Every Ocelot Duel Ending & Reward in MGS Delta Snake Eater

The video above showcases all 4 Ocelot duel endings in action

Ending

Choice

Description & Reward

Ocelot Wins

Pick the SAA on the Right.

Ocelot shoots Snake, but the bullet is revealed to have been a blank. He laments that this was fun, and then leaves.

This permanently unlocks the SAA revolver for NG and NG+ playthroughs.

Ocelot Loses

Pick the SAA on the Left, but don't shoot.

Ocelot is confused as to why Snake did not shoot him, compliments Snake's luck yet again, and leaves.

There is no reward for this ending.

Snake Wins

Pick the SAA on the Left, and shoot.

Snake shoots Ocelot, but Ocelot reveals that the bullet was just a blank. He laughs, speaks of his enjoyment of the duel, and leaves .

There is no reward for this ending.

Snake Misses

Pick the SAA on the Left, shoot away from Ocelot.

Ocelot grimaces at the fact that Snake missed, whether intentional or otherwise, and boasts about his luck before leaving.

There is no reward for this ending.

Should You Pick the Left or Right Revolver in MGS Delta Snake Eater?

Players should pick up the SAA on the Right if they want to permanently unlock the SAA revolver as a weapon to use on future playthroughs. Any other choice will unlock a cutscene, but nothing else. The SAA Revolver does make future playthroughs fun, as Snake can spin the weapon with tricks and even impress Ocelot during a boss fight with the weapon. While each cutscene plays out a tad differently, players won't be missing out on anything substantial.

The decision players make in this mini-scene will not impact the ending in any possible way.

item.title: Roblox: Kick a Brainrot Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Kick a Brainrot is a tycoon game that takes the popular Roblox concept of hatching creatures from eggs and raising them on a farm. However, the developers wanted to make the game unique, so they added cool mechanics that greatly increase the variety of gameplay. The main mechanic is described in the title: you need to kick a brainrot creature to add value to it. There are also mini-events that change the appearance of the map and add new eggs.

To make it easier for beginners to play, the developers have added a code redemption option. If you want to get cool rewards for free, redeem Kick a Brainrot codes from our list.

Updated September 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Two new Kick a Brainrot codes are now available, giving you useful boosts to enjoy. You can redeem them for a Cash Boost and a Luck Boost, both lasting one hour. These rewards can make a difference if you want to progress faster. Keep an eye out for future updates, as more codes could be released soon.

All Kick a Brainrot Codes

Working Kick a Brainrot Codes

  • 5MVISITS - Redeem this code to get 1h Cash Boost. (NEW)
  • 25KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 1h Luck Boost. (NEW)

Expired Kick a Brainrot Codes

  • 1MVISITS
  • 10KLIKES

By redeeming Kick a Brainrot codes, you can get a rare egg or some in-game currency. So, regardless of your experience in the game, it will be useful to get a little freebie.

How to Redeem Codes in Kick a Brainrot

In most Roblox games, redeeming codes is straightforward. In this game, the “Codes” button is located directly in the game interface, making it easy to use. However, it is easy for newcomers to overlook, so to assist you, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Kick a Brainrot :

  • Launch Roblox and open Kick a Brainrot .
  • Look at the right side of the screen. Click the purple Codes button.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click the checkmark button.

Remember, codes expire over time, so you need to redeem them as soon as possible to get rewards.

How to Get More Kick a Brainrot Codes

Sometimes you can find Roblox codes right in the game or on the page, but that's a rare thing. Usually, to find codes, you have to search for them in developers' social media accounts or on various gaming websites, and often, they are no longer valid. We regularly update our guides and add new working codes. To make sure you don't miss out on gifts, we recommend bookmarking this guide in your browser using the Ctrl+D key combination. But if you're more interested in the developers' social media accounts, you can follow the links below:

  • Kick a Brainrot Roblox game page
  • Kick a Brainrot Roblox group
  • Kick a Brainrot Discord server

item.title: Pokemon GO Origin Forme Palkia Raid Guide | Best Counters, Weaknesses & More
item.description:
Pokemon GO Origin Forme Palkia Raid winners might encounter a High IV Origin Forme Palkia. The Legendary Pokemon Origin Forme Palkia has higher base stats and can use Spacial Rend, making it a stronger variant than Standard Palkia. You cannot transform your Palkia into an Origin Forme Palkia; it is only available as a Raid reward encounter.

Pokemon GO Origin Forme Palkia is a dual Water and Dragon-type Pokemon with a maximum Combat Power of 4683 CP, which increases significantly as a 5-Star Raid Boss. Since Origin Forme Palkia is among some of the most powerful Raid Bosses, winning requires powerful counters. Only strategically selected counters can inflict notable damage to Origin Forme Palkia during Raid battles. That said, this guide details the best way to beat Origin Forme Palkia Pokemon GO Raids and get a High IV Origin Forme Palkia.

Pokemon GO: Origin Forme Palkia Weaknesses & Resistances

You can take advantage of Origin Forme Palkia’s type weaknesses in Pokemon GO . You have to be careful about the types it can resist during battles. Once you study its type-weaknesses and resistances, you can then proceed to selecting the best Origin Forme Palkia counters in Pokemon GO .

Weaknesses

Resistances

Dragon-type moves

Fire-type moves

Fairy-type moves

Water-type moves

Steel-type moves

Remember that Origin Forme Palkia is a powerful Raid Boss, and you should team up with 4 or more trainers to attempt the Raid. Do not try to clear the Origin Forme Palkia Raid solo.

Best Origin Forme Palkia Raid Counters In Pokemon GO

The best Origin Forme Palkia counters use moves that the Raid Boss is weak against. Considering its weaknesses, using Dragon and Fairy-type Pokemon with identical move types can trigger the STAB effect and inflict bonus damage. Here are the best Origin Forme Palkia Raid counters in Pokemon GO .

  • Mega Rayquaza : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Outrage (Dragon)
  • Mega Garchomp : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Breaking Swipe (Dragon)
  • Mega Gardevoir : Charm (Fairy) & Dazzling Gleam (Fairy)
  • Mega Salamence : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Draco Meteor (Dragon)
  • Shadow Palkia : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Draco Meteor (Dragon)
  • Shadow Dialga : Dragon Breath (Dragon) & Draco Meteor (Dragon)
  • Shadow Garchomp : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Breaking Swipe (Dragon)
  • Black Kyurem : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Outrage (Dragon)
  • Mega Latios : Dragon Breath (Dragon) & Dragon Claw (Dragon)
  • Shadow Salamence : Dragon Tail (Dragon) & Draco Meteor (Dragon)

Avoid Raid Locations with rainy and windy weather, since Origin Forme Palkia’s damage output increases in such weather conditions.

item.title: Roblox: Dungeon Lootify Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Dungeon Lootify offers RPG players a dungeon-crawling experience. You will have to explore different locations solo or with other players in search of valuable loot. Everything you pick up will be useful to you, be it valuables for sale or new equipment. Thankfully, the developers add free goodies that you will not want to miss, so check here for all the Dungeon Lootify codes.

These Roblox codes will reward you with various goodies. Among them, there are even chests of different tiers. But hurry, because they expire pretty quickly.

Updated September 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several new Dungeon Lootify codes have just been added, giving you a chance to collect Coins and Chests II. These rewards are helpful for strengthening your progress and making the game a little easier. If you’ve already redeemed the older ones, the fresh options bring more of the same useful bonuses. More codes could arrive in the future, so be sure to check back often for the latest updates.

All Dungeon Lootify Codes

Working Dungeon Lootify Codes

  • DEFENDGATE - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins and 3 Chests II (NEW)
  • THX4URHELP - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins and 3 Chests II (NEW)
  • DISCORD15K - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins and 3 Chests II (NEW)
  • DISCORD10K - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins and 3 Chests II
  • DISCORD5K - Redeem this code to get 500 Coins and 3 Chests II

Expired Dungeon Lootify Codes

There are no expired codes in Dungeon Lootify . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

While playing Dungeon Lootify , you will find various activities. In addition to clearing dungeons, players can also complete quests, create builds, trade equipment, and much more. It is worth noting that items play a key role in progression. Therefore, you should focus on grinding equipment and chests. Luckily, there is an easy way to get some rewards, even before your first run, using Dungeon Lootify codes.

Codes are a great source of free currencies and equipment. Among them, you can also find chests that drop random items, including rare ones. However, as always, Roblox codes are active for a limited time. And if you do not use them before the expiration date, the rewards will no longer be available to you.

How to Redeem Dungeon Lootify Codes

To redeem codes in Dungeon Lootify , you just need to make a few clicks. This feature works no more complicated than most other Roblox RPGs. But if this is your first time playing, follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Dungeon Lootify .
  • Next, open the Store by clicking on the appropriate button on the left side of the screen.
  • Next, enter the code in the form and click Confirm to claim the reward.

How to Get More Dungeon Lootify Codes

Developers often release new codes for Dungeon Lootify when players reach certain community milestones. And to get them first-hand, you'll want to start following the official developer pages. There you'll find all the news about the game, including upcoming events, updates, and fresh codes:

  • Official Big Coder Roblox Group
  • Official Dungeon Lootify Discord Server

item.title: Roblox: Surpermarket Together Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Surpermarket Together is a Roblox game where you become the owner of a small store. Since this is a simulation game, you will have to do all the work yourself, namely, ordering goods, arranging them on the shelves, and serving customers. Of course, over time, you will earn your first paycheck to get some money and expand further for more goods. You will be able to purchase additional shelves, more expensive goods, and cool decorations.

However, all of this will require many hours of gameplay because rapid progress in Roblox games is usually only available to those who are willing to spend Robux. Fortunately, the developers offer the opportunity to get free rewards. To do this, you can redeem Surpermarket Together codes from our guide and make starting your business a little easier.

Updated September 4, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Surpermarket Together has just added two new codes that give you a mix of rewards to use right away. One offers a speed boost that helps your customers move faster for a short time, while the other gives you some extra cash to support your progress. These bonuses can make managing your store a little easier while you expand. Keep checking back here so you don’t miss the next batch of updates.

All Surpermarket Together Codes

Working Surpermarket Together Codes

  • Awesome25k - Redeem this code to get 5 min Customer Speed Up. (NEW)
  • Wonderful30k - Redeem this code to get $2500. (NEW)

Expired Surpermarket Together Codes

  • Fantastic20k - Redeem this code to get $2000.
  • Amazing2500 - redeem the code to get rewards.
  • Super1500 - redeem the code to get rewards.
  • Welcome - Redeem this code to get $200.

Codes in Surpermarket Together can bring you a little money, which will be especially useful if you are a beginner. You will be able to buy a lot of goods at once and earn good money. For experienced players, this will not give a big boost, but the extra money will not be superfluous.

How to Redeem Codes in Surpermarket Together

Many Roblox games have the option to use codes. This is useful for both players and developers, so it's usually easy to use. Surpermarket Together is no exception, as the “Codes” button is located right in the game interface, so most players will find it quickly. However, some people still find it difficult to understand, so we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Surpermarket Together :

  • Launch Roblox and open Surpermarket Together .
  • If you are playing from a mobile device, press the phone icon on the left side of the screen. If you are playing from a PC, just press Z on the keyboard.
  • Next, click on the green Code button.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click on the green Enter button.

Remember that codes must be active to receive rewards, so redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Get More Surpermarket Together Codes

You can find more Roblox codes in this guide. Bookmark it in your browser, as we update it frequently to ensure you receive the latest codes. You can also visit the Surpermarket Together developer website for news about updates, codes, downtime, and more:

  • Surpermarket Together Roblox game page
  • Surpermarket Together Roblox group
